com.atakmap.android.ipc

Class DocumentedExtra

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.ipc.DocumentedExtra

  • public class DocumentedExtra
extends java.lang.Object
    Instead of using IntentFilters, ATAK makes use of DocumentedIntentFilter to provide for automatic extraction of documentation supplied by the developer. As part of the DocumentedIntent filter, the is DocumentedExtra that can be supplied in order to produce more robust documentation as well as in the future allow for validation of intents being passed into broadcast.

        Parameters:
